# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(OpenGL-Training LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(OpenGL-Training "")
set_target_properties(OpenGL-Training PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "OpenGL-Training")
set_target_properties(OpenGL-Training PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/macosx/arm64/debug")
target_include_directories(OpenGL-Training PRIVATE
    /Users/vincentson/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.3.8/a8f9078f9be44a1e87e24c92082beacc/include
    /Users/vincentson/.xmake/packages/g/glad/v0.1.36/4d2387580a614269b51355b85b7369c6/include
    /Users/vincentson/.xmake/packages/g/glm/0.9.9+8/0043e30ac3974dd2bced1344ae65efc4/include
    /Users/vincentson/.xmake/packages/s/stb/2021.09.10/a5eef0c926984a9da9c9ab04bb2ad1b9/include
)
target_compile_definitions(OpenGL-Training PRIVATE
    GLFW_INCLUDE_NONE
    GL_SILENCE_DEPRECATION
)
set_property(TARGET OpenGL-Training PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD 17)
target_compile_options(OpenGL-Training PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-arch>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-arch>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:arm64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:arm64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-mmacosx-version-min=12.4>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-mmacosx-version-min=12.4>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX12.3.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX12.3.sdk>
)
target_compile_features(OpenGL-Training PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET OpenGL-Training PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(OpenGL-Training PRIVATE
    glfw3
    glad
    "-framework Cocoa"
    "-framework IOKit"
    "-framework OpenGL"
    z
)
target_link_directories(OpenGL-Training PRIVATE
    /Users/vincentson/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.3.8/a8f9078f9be44a1e87e24c92082beacc/lib
    /Users/vincentson/.xmake/packages/g/glad/v0.1.36/4d2387580a614269b51355b85b7369c6/lib
)
target_link_options(OpenGL-Training PRIVATE
    -mmacosx-version-min=12.4
    -stdlib=libc++
)
target_sources(OpenGL-Training PRIVATE
    src/Texture.cpp
    src/Shader.cpp
    src/main.cpp
)
